text: Bengt Johansson (25 June 1942 â€“ 8 May 2022) was a Swedish handball player and coach. He was born in Halmstad, Sweden. He played in the Sweden men's national handball team between 1964 and 1972. He was better known as being the coach for the Swedish team from 1988 to 2004. Johansson died on 8 May 2022 from problems caused by Parkinson's disease at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Handball players Category:Sportspeople from Halmstad
title: Bengt Johansson
